item.title: DerbyCon 4.0
item.description: Unfortunately, I didn’t arrive at the ballroom early enough to get seats, or even standing room, to see this talk in-person: Ed Skoudis: How To Give The Best Pen Test Of Your Life If you’re a Pen Tester, this talk is a must-see. Once you’ve finished that talk, check out John Strand’s excellent follow-up talk! After competing for Friday night, most of Saturday, and Sunday morning, I emerged as the 30th position (solo) out of the 120 teams competing in the CTF.
